execution_quality: Good execution of the requested feature set. The agent created a functional script with dry-run mode and proper manual controls as specified. However, the immediate follow-up indicates the deduplication logic may have been incomplete or the script didn't fully prevent redownloading archived emails.
work_category: Script implementation for email archive deduplication with dry-run capability. User requested a practical tool with manual execution controls due to limited email volume in non-Gmail/Outlook accounts.
summary: The agent successfully created a script with the requested dry-run and manual execution features, demonstrating good autonomy and focused scope management. However, the follow-up message reveals a gap between the user's implicit expectation (preventing redownloads of partially archived emails) and what the script delivered, requiring significant iteration to add deduplication logic. The work was well-executed for the stated request but didn't fully anticipate the real-world problem.
follow_up_pattern: User identified a gap in the implementation (redownloading non-archived items) and requested deduplication logic to prevent it. This suggests the script worked as written but didn't fully solve the underlying problem, requiring iteration.
